Container: Simple widget which you can use to pack a child inside it, and then position it within the container (which can have size) with margin and padding.
Wrap: Wrap is a widget similar to Row and Column, but when there is no room left in row/column it wraps the children to next line. There is a bunch of parameters to adjust and reach the look you desire.
GridView: 2D array of widgets. Big advantage that it's scrollable so you wont lose any widget. By using GridView you can obtain nice "tile" effect.
